S:log-item.D:comment: DERBY-2063 (partial) Change ShutdownDBWhenNSShutsDown from being a JUnit test run under the old harness to one that is run as a regular JUnit tests. Add a new _Suite for derbynet and hook it into suites.All and the ant junit-all target. Required fixing some bugs in the DriverManager connection handling. Also refactored NetworkServerTestSetup to allow starting the server from the "command line" and to provide some utility methods for tests, e.g. to get a correctly setup NetworkServerControl.
